entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2022-24512 | .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #213
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2022-24464 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #212
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2020-8927 | .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #211
  • .NET March 2022 Updates #210

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Maui Android app spending time JIT'ing in MauiAppBuilderExtensions even when AOT'ing the whole app #66361
  • Rationale for invoking continuations synchronously vs. asynchronously as part of a call to CancellationTokenSource.Cancel #66354
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2022-24512 | .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #66348
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2020-8927 | .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #66346
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests. #66342
  • Regressions in System.Net.Http.Tests.SocketsHttpHandlerPerfTest #66343
  • Regressions in System.Globalization.Tests.StringSearch #66344
  • Regressions in System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.ReadJson<Hashtable> #66341
  • Cannot find mkstemps nor mkstemp on this platform (CMake Error at src/runtime.*/artifacts/source-build/self/src/src/libraries/Native/Unix/configure.cmake:788) #66340
  • Consolidate cryptography tests to System.Security.Cryptography #66338
  • [mono][gshared] generic instance function pointer crash #66337
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Enumerable.Append / Enumerable.AppendRange #66336
  • [API Proposal]: Provide tunnel status code for proxy exceptions #66329
    Future
  • Test failure JIT/Methodical/eh/nested/nestedtry/throwinnestedtrycatch_il_r/throwinnestedtrycatch_il_r.sh #66327
  • Use StartsWith literal optimization for OrdinalIgnoreCase in RegexCompiler / source generator #66324
    7.0.0
  • The documentation for Environment.ProcessPath needs an update #66323
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\General\\Vector128\\Vector128_r\\Vector128_r.cmd #66320

Closed

  • busy hang running System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.RegexMatchTests.StressTestDeepNestingOfLoops #65271
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Methodical/MDArray/basics/stringarr_cs_ro/stringarr_cs_ro.sh #65282
    7.0.0
  • After .NET 6 upgrade, debugger crashes when redirecting from one blazor wasm app to another #61917
    7.0.0
  • JitDisasm not showing code bytes on Arm64 Mac #65638
    7.0.0
  • SOLVED Cannot get symbol ucol_setMaxVariable_50 from libicui18n #66325
  • [.NET6 undocumented breaking change] HttpConnectionPool is throwing exception instead of returning HttpResponseMessage #65305
  • mark EncryptionPolicy.NoEncryption as obsolete #65545
    7.0.0
  • HTTPS request delays 21 secs randomly in C# (HttpClient) (UWP) #65636
  • Occasional timeouts in HttpConnectionPool.ConnectAsync #63706
    7.0.0
  • WebHeaderCollection.this[string] and WebHeaderCollection.Remove(string) does not use the name of the header when throwing exception for invalid chars #65136
    Future
  • [Mono] Clean up the type checks for `Vector64/128` #65318
    7.0.0
  • [Wasm][AOT] `Assertion: should not be reached at mini-llvm.c:5017` #66319
  • ReloadOnChange of AddJsonFile is invalid in kubernetes - not fixed #64222
  • Add ability to run build.cmd -vs corehost.sln #50838
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Regex.Count #61425
    7.0.0
  • DllImportGenerator conversion code fix should make the containing types partial #62291
    7.0.0
  • fips.c(145): OpenSSL internal error, assertion failed: FATAL FIPS SELFTEST FAILURE #1211
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0][wasm] Backport skipping System.Text.Json tests for the aot configuration #66366
  • Fix timeout checking in FindFinalStatePosition #66365
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Inject existing object into MEF2 #66364
    area-System.Composition, community-contribution
  • Clean up NonBacktracking DgmlWriter #66363
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Updating Unicode files to use 14.0.0 #66362
    area-System.Globalization
  • Add tests for `comhost` with managed host #66360
    area-Host
  • [mono][jit] Add a helper function to check that a method has the [Int… #66359
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [MAUI][PERF] Add IPA file usage for iOS Maui SOD #66358
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [WIP] Refactoring and perf of reflection Invoke #66357
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • [release/5.0] Backport AVX context fix #66120 #66356
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #66353
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #66352
  • Optimize Matrix4x4 Decompose with fewer stores #66351
    community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Pass generic context when ldftn of generic method #66350
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Implement {Try}HashData on asymmetric algorithms #66349
    area-System.Security
  • Add table of testing configurations #66347
  • Use StartsWith(..., OrdinalIgnoreCase) in RegexCompiler / source generator #66339
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • A better fix for #66242 #66335
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add timestamp-based expiration to cached SafeFreeCredentials #66334
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Enable CA1822 (Mark members as static) analyzer #66333
    area-Meta
  • Refactor and improve MLL tests #66332
    area-Host
  • Fix some exception messages for BindHandle-like cases #66326
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Partial revert of Maui Install Fix #65904 #66221
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix race conditions in SystemEvents shutdown logic #66230
    Servicing-approved, area-Microsoft.Win32, 6.0.4
  • Add "[createdump]" prefix to all createdump output and logging for VS4Mac #65444
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.4
  • [Release/6.0] Backporting recent fixes related to AVX and suspension. #66120
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 6.0.4
  • [release/6.0][EventPipe] Fix reverse connection socket leaking to child processes. #65768
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.4
  • [release/6.0] Build a new version of System.Runtime.Experimental with the correct assembly version #65733
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime, 6.0.4
  • Fix NonBacktracking quadratic behavior with deep loops #66038
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [release/6.0] Disable R2R code for all associated components of a composite image #65536
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 6.0.4
  • [release/6.0] Make sure WinHttpHandler 6.0.1 is released #65523
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Ensure that tls_destructionMonitor is initialized if a thread is attached to the runtime. #65406
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 6.0.4
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Fix (chrome|edge)://inspect for the debug proxy #65219
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.4
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Fixing race condition #64648
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.4
  • Fix code coverage gaps in RegexGenerator and fix RegexCompiler bug #66321
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Fix instruction hex display for arm/arm64 when W^X is on #66328
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Mark EncryptionPolicy.NoEncryption and EncryptionPolicy.AllowNoEncryption as obsolete #66292
    area-System.Net.Security, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add tests for `ijwhost` #66308
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • use the name of the header when throwing exception for invalid chars #66250
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Try additional nuget retries #66306
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono] Enable generating SIMD intrinsics for System.Numerics.Vector on Arm64 #65486
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono][jit] Remove OP_FCONV_TO_I/OP_RCONV_TO_I from the back ends, co… #66268
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • [mono][jit] Disable deopt in gsharedvt methods. #66322
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono] Put WeakAttribute support under an ifdef #66213
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add MultiModule test to issues.targets #66289
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Adding Count(ReadOnlySpan<char>) Overloads #66026
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Disable failing bindhandleinvalid tests #66303
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix ConditionalFactAttribute instances in ILPROJ tests #66312
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add partial to the enclosing types when running the ConvertToGeneratedDllImport fixer #65452
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Fix early stack offset and size computations for ARM32 with FEATURE_FASTTAILCALL enabled #66367
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Structs: Do not mark "Hidden buffer pointer" as address-exposed #64130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [DRAFT][PERF][MAUI]dotnet-podcast startup time and size measurements #65813
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Rename `GeneratedDllImportAttribute` -> `LibraryImportAttribute` #66307
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Add tracing to the Linux X509Chain implementation #65860
    area-System.Security
  • Improve `QuicImplementationProviders.MsQuic.IsSupported` for TLS1.3 On Windows #66019
    area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • Extend Equals/StartsWith auto-vectorization for OrdinalIgnoreCase #66095
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [draft] JSImportGenerator #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] add RID for Ubuntu 22.04 #66225
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Remove OpenSSL error queue checking in SslInitializer #65501
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.4
  • Stop collecting disposables if changed token encountered #66265
    area-Extensions-Primitives, community-contribution
  • Remove redundant allocations from JsonSerializerOptions.GetConverter calls #65898
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.4
  • [release/6.0] Backport Fix PerformanceCounter's when running with Globalization Invariant Mode #65537
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter, 6.0.4
  • Zip64ExtraField reads StartDiskNumber as uint32 #62959
    area-System.IO.Compression, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Add Maui performance scenarios to release6.0 runtime #65158
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Move Array.CreateInstance methods to shared CoreLib #66025
  • Remove compiler warning suppression #66234
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Moving "Generic Math" in box and making it no longer experimental #65731
    area-System.Numerics, blocked, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [Mono] Add SIMD intrinsics for Vector64/128 "All" and "Any" variants of GT/GE/LT/LE #65889
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Do not mark implicit byrefs with GTF_GLOB_REF #66266
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix compatibility with NTLM authentication to McAfee Web Gateway #66315
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.4
  • Add intrinsics for several operators #66317
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix #41618 Correct marshalling of SortKey objects on Linux #65548
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Enable Fast Tail Call Optimization for ARM32 #66282
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [PERF][MAUI] Add ios-arm64 logic to create .ipa for perf runs #66159
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • First try at implementing newly suggested ctor for providing tighter control over charset #63231
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Use ApiCompatTask in ApiCompat.proj #66073
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, blocked
  • Fix DNS cancellation deadlock #63904
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • Do not reorder HTTP header values #65249
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: DirectoryInfo.CopyTo / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Introduce write barriers in wasm bindings, migrate to ref/out params, add gc safe regions #65994
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Improves handling of env prefixes containing __ #65757
    breaking-change, area-Extensions-Configuration, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Add the CustomTypeMarshallerAttribute type to make it easier to identify marshaller types #65591
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet run --property:Configuration=Release creates release binaries on linux, but tries to execute debug version which is not there #24277
  • With .NET SDK 6.0.300-preview.22154.4, warning NETSDK1179 still shows when running "dotnet publish -r win-x64 --self-contained" in CLI #24269
    6.0.3xx
  • CLI completion showing ^M after options #24268

PullRequests

Created

  • Error using skip-manifest-update and --from-rollback-file #24288
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.3xx] Fix FSharp publishing #24287
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #24285
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.2xx #24284
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0.2xx #24283
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0.4xx #24282
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1.4xx #24281
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix typo in MSDeploy.cs #24271
  • Remove the package DeploymentReleasesVersion #24266
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #24265
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Workload update timer #24104
    Area-Workloads

Updated

  • Add test retry #21186
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1652299 #23858
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update CODEOWNERS #24253
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch away from expiring helix queues #24078
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Nested struct fields don't get initialization warnings #60038
  • New Rename UI doesn't auto-focus #60035
  • VSIX deployment fails with IOException #60031
  • `Debug.Fail` fires for "Remove unused value" code fix provider #60030
  • Make FixAll APIs for ContainingType/Member scope public #60029
  • Have layer mode in the editor to support multiple features #60020

Closed

  • Follow-up cleanup work for IIncrementalAnalyzer #45936
    Backlog
  • Move *OptionsMetadata types to EditorFeatures #59184
    17.2
  • Typo on CodeGenDifferences.md file #59967
  • AnalyzeDataFlow fails #59738
    17.2
  • Extraneous padding is not removed when formatting string interpolations #59811
    Backlog
  • "Convert to file-scoped namespace" adds a blank newline to the end of the document #59728
    17.2
  • Remove Unnecessary Usings does not preserve empty line between file scoped namespace and usings inside #58972
    17.2
  • Win32ResourceFile not working #59990
  • [LSP] Razor C# doc comments do not auto-complete #59772
    17.2
  • Issues with formatting and whitespace around !! annotation #59580
    17.2

PullRequests

Created

  • Add back logic for main-vs-deps branch #60037
    Area-Infrastructure
  • WIP: Support smart pasting of contents into strings. #60036
    Area-IDE
  • Fix transition for cancelled light bulb in integration tests #60034
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main into features/semantic-snippets #60033
    Area-IDE
  • Support consumption scenarios for checked user-defined operators #60032
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Make call-hierarchy navigation cancellable #60024
    Area-IDE
  • Fix binding order for Dispose in async foreach #60022
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Async Streams
  • Fix path to readme.md #60019
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to release/dev17.3 #60018
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Editor namespaces refactoring - part 2 #59980
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add LSP spell checking support. #59693
    Area-IDE
  • Fix more lock contention #59638
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move diagnostic service to LSP layer #59456
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix typo in CodeGenDifferences.md #59994
    Documentation, Area-SDK and Samples, Next
  • Clarify breaking change documentation for struct initialization and correct link #60015
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Require a matching regular operator for a checked operator #59937
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Analyze flow in receiver of extension method group in delegate creation #59874
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Inline Diagnostics Multi-Line Errors #60013
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fixing up bits of PR feedback. #60021
    Area-IDE
  • Simplify code with helper method #60000
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Value tracking cancelable #60027
    Area-IDE
  • Format whitespace in interpolations #60028
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Preserve trivia from first using in file scoped namespace #60026
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Preserve the lack of trivia at the end of the file #60023
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #60025
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix !! incremental parsing #59977
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Clean up info bar and error reporting service #59981
    Area-IDE, Next
  • ColorSchemes namespace refactoring #59985
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Check for prototype comments in separate job #59862
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Filter to exact test class names in RunTests #59752
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge release/dev16.9-vs-deps to release/dev16.11-vs-deps #60017
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Simplify consumption side of the new async navigation helpers. #59838
    Area-IDE

Updated

  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60040
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Inline Diagnostics: Call dispose and removed event handler that was unnnecessary #60039
    Area-IDE
  • EditorFeatures.Cocoa: Build with net6.0-macos #59429
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Implicit field initialization in struct constructors #59788
    Area-Compilers
  • Initial implementation of a new 'lightweight' background-work-indicator that we can use in-situ in the editor. #59759
    Area-IDE
  • Enable embedded languages to export the identifier they should be associated with in comments/attributes #59983
    Area-IDE
  • [semi-auto-props]: Fix speculative semantic model scenarios #59767
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Implement IAttributeOperation #59369
    Area-Compilers, Community, Feature - IOperation
  • Fix 'unnecessary assigment' false posititive for out argument (#58564) #59625
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Solution crawler options #59800
    Area-IDE
  • Always try to use cached data for import completion even if outdated #59760
    Area-IDE
  • Handle optional exclamations in conditional access in RecommendationServiceRunner #60012
    Area-IDE
  • Make IdeAnalyzerOptions global #59657
    Area-IDE
  • Remove some outdated configurations in tools #52800
    Area-Compilers, Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Add details on validating related to EnC #60008
    Area-Compilers
  • KeyOriginatorFile is input to csc task #59999
    Area-Compilers, 17.2
  • Trim leading blank lines in IDE0017 #59993
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Remove obsolete helpers #60010
    Area-IDE
  • Add FixAll in containing type/member support for code fixes #59989
    Area-IDE, 17.2.P2
  • Add support for unsafe local functions in IDE0062 code fix #59297
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fixed simple signature help bugs #59969
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Port more flaky integration tests #59897
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix support for OOP reporting diagnostics in source generated files #60016
    Area-Analyzers
  • [LSP] Allow Razor to utilize C# LSP server in tests #59995
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Make navigate-to navigation cancellable. #59828
    Area-IDE
  • Remove unneeded `isPartial` check #59978
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #59831

  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #59858
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #59939
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Support declaring and binding to methods with `params Span<T>` #59123
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix type parameter scoping for local functions #59968
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Use a longer timeout if we previously had a successful Source Link result #59698
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Horizontal tabs should be allowed in header values #40599
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2022-24464 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #40598
    Discussions
  • Build ASP.NET Core from Source error #40596
  • Blazor Server App fails to restart when restarted by IIS #40595
    6.0.4
  • Use Vite in the SPA templates #40594
  • After updating to .Net6 An unhandled exception occurred while processing the request. <component type="typeof(App)" render-mode="ServerPrerendered" /> #40593
  • .NET 6 and AKS - how to keep web app from snoozing? #40592
  • Using HttpContextAccessor in Asp.NET Core hosted Blazor Web Assembly throws error #40590
  • CLI Hot reload Blazor wasm just doesn't work. #40587

Closed

  • Add an EventSource event when the server is listening for incoming requests #40238
    7.0-preview3
  • No brotli compression _blazor #40581
  • InstallJdk incorrectly thinks jdk is already installed #36331
    Backlog
  • Add support for pinging and timeouts to C++ client #8721
    7.0-preview3
  • Allow validation attributes on PageModel itself #40591
  • Minor error in null checking of constructor of Microsoft.AspNetCore.Routing.Template class. #40571
    Backlog
  • SignalR cant invoke a parameterless method #40573

PullRequests

Created

  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #40602
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #40601
    area-infrastructure, 5.0.x

    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • feat : Add `StringSyntax` for regex parameters #40589
    area-mvc, community-contribution

Merged

  • Add ServerReady event to HostingEventSource #40585
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3
  • Check jdk is correctly installed #40550
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • [release/5.0] Update `url-parse` component #40586
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.16
  • !nits! Slight Testing cleanup #40564
    area-infrastructure, test-fixed, 7.0-preview3
  • [release/3.1] Update various components #40584
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.24
  • [release/6.0] Update `url-parse` component #40588
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.4
  • Fix ArgumentNullException for Routing TemplateParser #40583
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview3

Updated

  • Added onmouseleave and onmouseenter events. #40519
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Partition some pools by core #40476
    Perf, area-runtime
  • Arm64 installers Take 2 #40562
    area-infrastructure, feature-installers
  • Update sdk to v7.0.100-preview.3.22122.1 #40353
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Build .rpm packages for linux arm64 #40504
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Build .rpm packages for linux arm64 #40485
    area-infrastructure
  • In JS interop, handle ValueTask equivalently as Task (#40198) #40533
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Trim Http.Extensions #40561
    area-runtime, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-08
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • dotnet-symbol fails with "ERROR: Sequence contains no elements" #2917
    .NET 7.0

Updated

  • Using EventSource's Start/Stop opcodes - cover best-practices and potential caveats. #2908
    .NET 7.0
  • Writing "fast" EventSource with WriteEventCore API "best practices". #2904
    .NET 7.0
  • [Documentation] EventSource documentation improvement #1736
    .NET 7.0
  • `EventSource` should mention some built-in types require special handling #2608
    .NET 7.0
  • cpu-usage greater than 100% #321
    .NET 7.0
  • dotnet-trace prints "Unable to examine process." (when run in Kudu command line on App Service) #2781
    .NET 7.0
  • How to halt dotnet-trace in an automated context (CI job) #2881
  • Document environment variables to enable tracing #616
    .NET 7.0
  • Diagnostic Port and Microsoft.Diagnostics.NetCore.Client #2900
    .NET 7.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support for NFC #5153
  • WinUI Resources XAML - Evaluate/Remove unneeded styles #5150
  • Stepper - Use default control templates for WinUI3 #5148
  • Slider - Use default control templates for WinUI3 #5147
  • ComboBox - Use default control templates for WinUI3 #5146
  • CheckBox - Use default control templates for WinUI3 #5145
  • Auto Suggest Box - Use default control templates for WinUI3 #5144
  • Activity Indicator - Use default control templates for WinUI3 #5143
  • RichTextKit/SkiaSharp on Android: Could not resolve type with token 0100000b from typeref (expected class 'System.ReadOnlySpan`1' in assembly 'mscorlib') #5142
  • Linked label clearing on update #5140
  • ApplicationVersion value does not affect Windows App #5137
  • BlazorWebView inside Android can't be reloaded #5136
  • [iOS]The location is null when Geolocation.GetLocationAsync(); is called #5132
  • Completed event does not fire on Return key on Editor #5130
  • The focus event does not fire on Editor #5126
  • UnFocus Event of Editor does not fire when changing the focus to another view #5124
  • MAUI Blazor Deploy Failed #5123
  • [iOS]Keyboard covers the editor #5121
  • [Android]VerticalStackLayout HorizontalOptions= Center is not working on Android #5119
  • Multiple box views with same Height Request differs in size #5118
  • CollectionView SelectedItem not highlighted on Android until scroll #5117
  • [iOS]HorizontalLayoutOptions=Center but the editor still is displayed on start #5116

Closed

  • NavigationRoot - Use default control templates for WinUI3 #5149
  • Picker default selection ignores setting SelectedIndex on Android #4030
  • XAML Hot Reload not working running MAUI app on Macos #5115
  • The StrokeDashArray property in Ellipse cannot be animated #4566
  • [IOS] TimePicker crashes when clicking "Done" #4228
  • Opacity has no effect on Frame #5100
  • [Bug] Breakpoints when debugging always point to external code #2699
  • Review what events should fire when a view is removed from the visual tree #3163
    6.0.200-preview.11
  • Make MAUI AOT profile the default for MAUI Apps in Release configurations #2740
    6.0.101-preview.10
  • [Bug] Missing integration between old ImageSourceHandlers and new ImageSourceServices #867
    .NET 7

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Visibility of header elements if they have no content #5152
  • Route Shell Modal Navigation through ShellSection #5151
  • Move `WeakEventManager` to `Core.csproj` #5139
  • [iOS] Fix TabbedPage colors in iOS 15 #5135
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/TabbedPage
  • [Housekeeping] Update the Gallery with more focus samples #5133
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Windows] WebView not loading HtmlWebViewSource #5131
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Windows] Fix Button incorrect VisualStates #5122
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [X] Convert element before adding to collections #5120

Merged

  • Fix crash in cascade tests on Windows #5138
  • Make sure StrokeDashArray property invalidate the Shape. #5109
    area/drawing ✏️
  • [Android] Update cursor visibility when IsReadOnly Property changes on Entry #5001
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Update Bug Report template to add `s/needs-verification` label #5134
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Optimize ConfigureFonts and Logging during startup #5103
    area/fonts 🅰️
  • [loc] Add file to update LocProject.json with template json loc files #5125
    area/localization
  • [ios] Fix crash when updating TimePicker #5114
  • [Blazor] Align our Blazor Maui template with the Blazor RTM template #4922
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Revert Android 300 band manifest for now #5112
  • License matches other .NET projects #5074
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Fix Shell Title Calculation #5113
    area/shell 🐢
  • [GH-4958] Platform behavior implementation #5043
  • Essentials.FilePicker WIP refactored to interface and singleton #4632
    area/essentials 🍞
  • CarouselView fix measure for CarouselView.Loop #5077
    area/layout 🔲, area/collectionview 📃
  • [iOS] Update DatePickerHandler and TimePickerHandler #3761
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker
  • Mark all the Device [Obsolete] #5088
  • Fix Android crashing issue #4860
    platform/android 🤖, area/templates 📄, high
  • Add first iteration of default style theme #5111
    do-not-merge
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄, Future
  • DisplayActionSheet later #5047
    platform/windows 🪟
  • Fix issue using LineBreakMode and MaxLines at the same time #5093
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Wrong ErrorCode reported by SqliteException #27597
  • IsTemporal() with SetIsMemoryOptimized(true) generates invalid CREATE TABLE #27592

Closed

  • Error With Temporals using InMemory Provider #27587
  • Redundant order by when selecting subquery field #27590

PullRequests

Created

  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #27596
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #27595
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1 #27594
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #27593
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • Tiny workaround for analyzer issue #27591
  • Generate temp values for key properties contained in optional FKs #27579
    Servicing-approved

Updated

  • Scaffolding: Enable text templates #27565
  • Bump NetTopologySuite.IO.SqlServerBytes from 2.0.0 to 2.1.0 #27518
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Attribute for configuring composite primary keys #27571
  • Update to .NET SDK 7.0 Preview 1 #27447
